SEARCH
Package UI

Class MenusUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
UI.MenusUI
public class MenusUI extends BaseUI
The `MenusUI` class extends the `BaseUI` class and represents the user interface for managing menus, dishes, and wines in the restaurant management system.
